CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to load the script 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/script.js' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "script-src 127.0.0.1:*/sec". Note that 'script-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'script-src' is used as a fallback.

CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to load the script 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/script.js' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "script-src 127.0.0.1:*/sec/". Note that 'script-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'script-src' is used as a fallback.

CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to load the script 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/script.js' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "script-src 127.0.0.1:8000/not-security". Note that 'script-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'script-src' is used as a fallback.

CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to load the script 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/script.js' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "script-src 127.0.0.1:8000/security%3bnot-contentSecurityPolicy". Note that 'script-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'script-src' is used as a fallback.

Resources should be rejected unless they match a whitelisted path.

Frame: '<!--framePath //<!--frame0-->-->'
